title: Provide Product Image Assets to a Retailer
description: A retailer needs high-resolution images of products to use on their own e-commerce website.

tasks.description: Receive a request from a retailer for product images.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent understands which product images are needed.

tasks.description: Access the digital asset management (DAM) system to find the approved images.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the high-resolution product photos.

tasks.description: Provide the retailer with a link to download the images.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends the retailer a secure link to the image files.
